mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , ROWNUM PK_COL , E.* FROM (SELECT OL.ODR_LST_ID , OL.MBR_ID , OL.ODR_LST_ODR_PRCS , TO_CHAR(OL.ODR_LST_RGST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ODR_LST_RGST_DT , OL.ODR_LST_RGSTR , TO_CHAR(OL.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , OL.MDFYR , OL.STR_ID , S.STR_NM FROM ODR_LST OL INNER JOIN STR S ON OL.STR_ID = S.STR_ID ORDER BY ODR_LST_RGST_DT DESC) E
